knimeNode.name: PMML Integrator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Integrates a PMML preprocessing port object into a PMML model.

fullDescription.intro: Integrates a PMML preprocessing port object into a PMML model. This is done by injecting the collected preprocessing operations (available at the second input) into the corresponding location in the PMML model. Note that most KNIME PMML predictor nodes do not support preprocessing instructions in PMML. This node is meant to be used 3rd party deployment applications, which support the full PMML standard.

ports.inPort: Preprocessings steps to integrate into model.
